TopicTitle: Kerbal can glitch into Mun if ladder penetrate ground

Articles.Content:
Have a vehicle with extendable ladder.
ladder extends beyond landing gear.
while landed on Mun EVA, climb to tip of ladder (under terrain)
leave ladder, Kerbal fall to Mun center, then slingshot out at incredible speed then exit solar system

have been able to reproduce using different vehicle builds.

landed on Mun, Bob on ladder penetrating ground https://prnt.sc/FLp9Eur9xU-w
Bob on bottom of ladder, camera also glitch trough ground https://prnt.sc/gEItr5ZdDQ91
Bob @ 283 242 m/s https://prnt.sc/HA8ui4p1M3-N
escape trajectory https://prnt.sc/jDWxBhD5loC_
also have save file
